name: The Not-So-Great Potato
description: Root of all humor.|The potato king insists he's a tomato. Help him come to terms with his tuber truth.

text: I'm a juicy red tomato! I swear!
Prove me wrong and I'll give you treasures.
completedText: Seek evidence about Pete's true identity.

text: Oh, Pete? He's definitely a potato.
I've got an old photo of him sprouting!
completedText: Return to Pete with the photo.

text: Oh dear, I'm really a potato, huh?
Thanks for setting me straight. Here's your reward!

popup.title: Quest completed!
popup.text: @green@You've unveiled the truth of Pete's past! Enjoy your sparkling @crimson@potato-tiara@green@ and a sack of very bewildered vegetables.
